name: Immortal Ka
description:
The Gods have condemned us, now Egypt is corrupted and thousands of creatures from the world of the dead torment us.

Maibe, a lonely hunter from the outskirts of Luxor has received the vision. She will be the only one with a pure soul who will save us.

  • Discover and explore the ancient Egypt corrupted by the wrath of the Gods.
  • A complete arsenal: sword, harpoon, bow, boomerang, axes.
  • Fight against great mythological creatures.
  • Travel to the world of the dead to recover the souls of the fallen.

Original Soundtrack:

[Works great with a controller]

This project was canceled its development in 2019, although it is not a finished product, it does contain a lot of final content.

Still remember that it is a prototype, so there may be crashes or bugs.

💻Code & Design: @josyanf1
🎨Art: @leanderpixel
🔊Audio: @bibikigarcia
